Using a slotted spoon, remove the nuts to a paper towel to drain. 4. In a bowl, whisk together the orange juice, rice vinegar, soy sauce, honey and cornstarch and set aside. 5. In a large skillet, heat the remaining 2 tablespoons canola oil on high heat. 6. Add the scallion whites, citrus peel, ginger, garlic and chilies and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 1-2 minutes. 7. Add the broccoli, carrots, peppers, and broth and cook until the vegetables begin to soften, about 2-3 minutes. 8. Give the reserved sauce a stir, then add it to the skillet and cook, stirring, until a shiny glaze forms. 9. Stir in the sesame oil and remove from the heat. 10. Gently stir in the orange segments and fried walnuts. 11. Divide among four bowls and garnish with the scallion greens. 12. Serve with rice.

title: Ww 7 Point Chicken Noodle Casserole
ingredients: Ingredients: 1. 12 lb yolk free egg noodles 2. 3 tablespoons all purpose flour 3. 2 teaspoons grapeseed oil 4. 1 onion 5. 2 cups nonfat milk 6. 12 tablespoon dijon mustard 7. 1 tablespoon tarragon 8. 1 package frozen peas 9. 2 cups chicken 10. 12 cup reduced fat cheddar cheese
instructions: Instructions: 1. Preheat oven top 350 degrees. 2. Spray a 2 quart high sided baking dish with nonstick spray. 3. cook the noodles per package directions drain and set aside. 4. meanwhile, whisk the flour and 1/2 cup of the broth in a small bowl until the flour dissolves. 5. Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. 6. Add the onion and cook, stirring frequently, until softened, about 3 minute Stir in the milk and the remaining 1/2 cup broth; bring the mixture to a simmer. 7. Whisk in the flour mixture; cook stirring constantly, until the sauce bubbles and thicknes, about 3 minute Stir in the mustard and tarragon. 8. Mix the peas and chicken in with sauce. 9. pour noodles into baking dish then top with sauce mixture. 10. Stir the mixture together then top with cheese. 11. Bake Until bubbling and golden brown abour 40 minute. 12. Let stand for 5 min then serve.

title: Israeli Couscous Risotto with Shiitakes
ingredients: Ingredients: 1. 2 tbs. olive oil 2. 6 oz. shiitake mushrooms 3. 1 poblano chile 4. 2 shallots 5. 1 carrot 6. 1 8.8 oz. box israeli couscous 7. 1 2 cup or frozen peas 8. 3 tbs. chives 9. 2 tbs. tarragon
instructions: Instructions: 1. Bring broth and 2 cups water to a boil in saucepan. 2. Reduce heat to low. 3. Heat 1 Tbs. 4. oil in large saucepan over medium heat. 5. Add mushrooms and poblano, and saute 5 minutes, or until mushrooms have released their juices. 6. Transfer to plate, and set aside. 7. Heat remaining 1 Tbs. 8. oil in same pan over medium heat. 9. Add shallots, and saute 2 minutes, or until soft. 10. Add carrot, and saute 3 minutes more. 11. Add couscous, and cook 3 minutes, or until lightly browned, stirring constantly. 12. Stir 1/4 cup broth mixture into couscous mixture. 13. Reduce heat to medium low. 14. Add 1/4 cup more liquid, and cook until liquid has been absorbed. 15. Continue adding liquid, cooking and stirring 12 minutes, or until couscous is tender and all liquid has been used, adding more water if necessary to finish cooking. 16. Add peas and reserved mushroom mixture, and cook 2 minutes more, or until peas are heated through. 17. Stir in 3 Tbs. 18. chives and tarragon, and season with salt and pepper. 19. Serve garnished with remaining chives.

title: Slamma Jamma Parmigiana
ingredients: Ingredients: 1. 4 boneless skinless 2. 12 cup kosher salt 3. 12 cup sugar 4. 1 12 cups all purpose flour 5. 2 eggs 6. 14 cup milk 7. 1 12 cups dried breadcrumbs 8. 1 12 cups panko breadcrumbs 9. 14 teaspoon dried oregano 10. 14 teaspoon dried basil 11. 1 teaspoon dried parsley 12. 1 teaspoon sea salt 13. 12 teaspoon black pepper 14. 1 lb mozzarella cheese 15. 14 lb parmigiano reggiano cheese 16. olive oil 17. 1 lb penne rigate 18. tomato sauce 19. 14 cup italian parsley 20. 2 tablespoons virgin olive oil 21. 1 yellow onion 22. 4 garlic cloves 23. 6 cups and roma tomatoes 24. 1 tablespoon basil leaf 25. 12 tablespoon oregano leaves 26. salt & black pepper
instructions: Instructions: 1. Lightly pound the chicken breasts to 1/2-inch thickness. 2. Combine the kosher salt, sugar, and 1 quart of water in a 1-gallon size resealable plastic bag; shake until dissolved. 3. Add the chicken breasts and soak at room temperature for 30 minutes. 4. Place the flour in a medium bowl. 5. Remove the chicken from the brine. 6. Shake off excess moisture and, with tongs, lightly dredge the chicken in the flour. 7. Shake off the excess flour and transfer to a large plate. 8. Mix the eggs and milk in medium bowl and whisk thoroughly. 9. In a separate bowl combine the bread crumbs, oregano, basil, parsley, sea salt, and pepper. 10. Dredge the chicken in the egg and milk mixture with tongs and let excess mixture drain off. 11. Now dredge the chicken into the bread crumb mixture, and lightly pat down in the bread crumbs to adhere. 12. Preheat the broiler. 13. Let the breaded chicken sit for 5 minutes before frying. 14. In a medium saucepan on medium-high heat, add enough olive oil to come 1/3 up the side of the chicken. 15. Cook the chicken in batches until golden brown on both sides. 16. Remove from the pan when cooked and place on a sheet tray. 17. Repeat with remaining chicken. 18. When all the chicken is cooked, sprinkle mozzarella and Parmesan evenly over the top. 19. Place under the broiler until the cheese melts and is golden brown. 20. Serve chicken over pasta and ladle tomato sauce on top. 21. Garnish with additional Parmesan and parsley. 22. Tomato Sauce:. 23. Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a saucepan. 24. Add the onions and cook until translucent. 25. Add the garlic and cook until almost brown, then add tomatoes. 26. Saute for 30 minutes over low to medium heat. 27. Add the basil and oregano and continue to cook for 30 minutes longer. 28. Puree in a food mill or let cool and puree in a food processor. 29. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. 30. .

title: Diet Cookies

title: Grandma's Spaghetti Sauce

title: Pickled Vegetables
ingredients: Ingredients: 1. 3 cups white wine vinegar 2. 1 cup water 3. 1 2 cup sugar 4. 1 teaspoon red pepper 5. 1 teaspoon cumin seed 6. 1 teaspoon coriander seed 7. 1 teaspoon white pepper 8. 1 2 teaspoon cloves 9. 1 bay leaf 10. 6 cloves garlic 11. 1 cup carrots 12. 1 cup cauliflower florets 13. 1 cup red pepper 14. 1 cup red onion 15. 1 cup baton zucchini
instructions: Instructions: 1. Bring vinegar, water, sugar and spices to a boil. 2. In succession add carrots, cauliflower, red pepper, onions and zucchini, leaving 2-3 minutes between addition of each vegetable. 3. Remove from heat and let cool.

title: Bride's Pink Punch Recipe
ingredients: Ingredients: 1. 3 ounce. box strawberry jello 2. 1 c. water 3. 1 pack unsweetened strawberry kool aid 4. 2 quarts. cool water 5. 2 1 2 c. sugar 6. 46 ounce. can pineapple juice 7. 10 ounce. 7 up 8. 2 pts. pineapple sherbet
instructions: Instructions: 1. Dissolve Jello in boiling water. 2. Mix kool-aid, cool water and sugar. 3. Add in Jello with kool-aid and pineapple juice. 4. Store till ready to use. 5. Add in 7-Up and spoonfuls of sherbet when ready to serve. 6. Serves 35 people.

title: Easy Clam Pasta
ingredients: Ingredients: 1. 1 pasta 2. 150 grams manila clams 3. 1 tbsp olive oil 4. 1 tsp garlic 5. 50 ml white wine 6. 50 ml pasta water 7. 1 tbsp butter 8. 1 dash soy sauce 9. 1 pinch black pepper
instructions: Instructions: 1. Put the clams in salt water while we prepare the pasta. 2. Clean the clams of sand and salt. 3. If you are making a large amount, you can freeze the leftovers for later. 4. In a pan, heat olive oil and garlic and over low. 5. When the garlic becomes aromatic, pour in the white wine on high heat. 6. Cover and simmer on low to medium heat until the clams open. 7. As the clams start to open, remove the lid. 8. When they look ready, add in the pasta and stir. 9. At this point, add in the soy sauce. 10. Then serve on a plate with a sprinkle of pepper.
